item.title: LEGGETT PLATT INC 10-K
item.description: LEGGETT PLATT INC, which is in the Household Furniture [2510] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 22, 2022 had 38315 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 382 instances 1 - 312 instances 2020 - 282 instances products - 275 instances financial - 251 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
